name: Nite Ize CamJam XT Rope Tightener
description: The CamJam XT combines a carabiner with cam locking mechanism, allowing you to secure and tension large loads with rope or cord. Tension can be easily adjusted or released by rotating the cam locking lever.Rugged cast aluminum construction.Achieve and maintain high tension without knots.Adjust and release tension by rotating the cam lock lever.Tensions loops and fixed end systems.Large load limit is 127kg with breaking strength of 380kg. Fits ropes 2mm to 5mm.X-Large load limit is 227kg, with breaking strength of 680kg. Fits ropes up to 9.5mm.Do not use where disengagement could result in bodily injury or property damage.Not for climbing.Ensure the rope or cord being used is strong enough to safely secure the load.
